trans-unit.source: Enter a site title. This title will show up in the Web browser Title Bar and will be a tooltip on the site Logo.
trans-unit.target: Enter a site title. This title will show up in the Web browser Title Bar and will be a tooltip on the site Logo.

trans-unit.source: Enter a description for the site here.
trans-unit.target: Enter a description for the site here.

trans-unit.source: Enter some keywords for your site (separated by commas). These keywords are used by search engines to help index the site.
trans-unit.target: Enter some keywords for your site (separated by commas). These keywords are used by search engines to help index the site.

trans-unit.source: The TimeZone for the location of the site.
trans-unit.target: The TimeZone for the location of the site.

trans-unit.source: The globally unique identifier which can be used to identify this site.
trans-unit.target: The globally unique identifier which can be used to identify this site.

trans-unit.source: If supported by the theme this Copyright text is displayed on your site.
trans-unit.target: If supported by the theme this Copyright text is displayed on your site.

trans-unit.source: The location used for the storage of files in this site.
trans-unit.target: The location used for the storage of files in this site.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the theme chosen, this image will typically appear in the top left corner of the page.
trans-unit.target: Depending on the theme chosen, this image will typically appear in the top left corner of the page.

trans-unit.source: The selected favicon will be applied to all pages in the site.
trans-unit.target: The selected favicon will be applied to all pages in the site.

trans-unit.source: The selected iconset will be applied to all icons on the site.
trans-unit.target: The selected iconset will be applied to all icons on the site.

trans-unit.target: Could not update settings. Please try later.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to cancel your changes?

trans-unit.source: You must provide a title for your site.
trans-unit.target: You must provide a title for your site.

trans-unit.source: Enter any tags (i.e. META tags) that should be rendered in the "HEAD" tag of the HTML for this page.
trans-unit.target: Enter any tags (i.e. META tags) that should be rendered in the "HEAD" tag of the HTML for this page.

trans-unit.source: The Splash Page for your site.
trans-unit.target: The Splash Page for your site.

trans-unit.source: The Home Page for your site.
trans-unit.target: The Home Page for your site.

trans-unit.source: The Login Page for your site. Only pages with the Account Login module are listed.
trans-unit.target: The Login Page for your site. Only pages with the Account Login module are listed.

trans-unit.source: The User Profile Page for your site.
trans-unit.target: The User Profile Page for your site.

trans-unit.source: The user registration page for your site.
trans-unit.target: The user registration page for your site.

trans-unit.source: The search results page for your site.
trans-unit.target: The search results page for your site.

trans-unit.source: The 404 Error Page for your site. Users will be redirected to this page if the URL they are navigating to results in a "Page Not Found" error.
trans-unit.target: The 404 Error Page for your site. Users will be redirected to this page if the URL they are navigating to results in a "Page Not Found" error.

trans-unit.source: The 500 Error Page for your site. Users will be redirected to this page if the URL they are navigating to results in an unexpected error.
trans-unit.target: The 500 Error Page for your site. Users will be redirected to this page if the URL they are navigating to results in an unexpected error.

trans-unit.source: Select to prevent users from sending messages to specific users or groups. This restriction doesn't apply to Administrators or Super Users.
trans-unit.target: Select to prevent users from sending messages to specific users or groups. This restriction doesn't apply to Administrators or Super Users.

trans-unit.source: Enter the number of minutes after which a user can send the next message. Zero indicates no restrictions. This restriction doesn't apply to Administrators or Super Users.
trans-unit.target: Enter the number of minutes after which a user can send the next message. Zero indicates no restrictions. This restriction doesn't apply to Administrators or Super Users.

trans-unit.source: Maximum number of recipients allowed in To field. A message sent to a Role is considered as a single recipient.
trans-unit.target: Maximum number of recipients allowed in To field. A message sent to a Role is considered as a single recipient.

trans-unit.source: Enable to automatically convert profane (inappropriate) words and phrases into something equivalent. The list is managed on the Host->List->ProfanityFilters and the Admin->List->ProfanityFilters pages.
trans-unit.target: Enable to automatically convert profane (inappropriate) words and phrases into something equivalent. The list is managed on the Host->List->ProfanityFilters and the Admin->List->ProfanityFilters pages.

trans-unit.source: Choose whether attachments can be attached to messages.
trans-unit.target: Choose whether attachments can be attached to messages.

trans-unit.source: Choose whether attachments are to be included with outgoing email.
trans-unit.target: Choose whether attachments are to be included with outgoing email.

trans-unit.source: Select if emails are to be sent to recipients for every message and notification.
trans-unit.target: Select if emails are to be sent to recipients for every message and notification.

trans-unit.source: Select default profile visibility mode for user profile.
trans-unit.target: Select default profile visibility mode for user profile.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to display the profile visibility control on the User Profile page.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to display the profile visibility control on the User Profile page.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to force old style profile URLs to be redirected to custom URLs.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to force old style profile URLs to be redirected to custom URLs.

trans-unit.source: Enter a string to use to prefix vanity URLs.
trans-unit.target: Enter a string to use to prefix vanity URLs.

trans-unit.source: Enter a name for the property.
trans-unit.target: Enter a name for the property.

trans-unit.source: Select the data type for this field.
trans-unit.target: Select the data type for this field.

trans-unit.source: Enter the category for this property. This will allow the related properties to be grouped when dislayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Enter the category for this property. This will allow the related properties to be grouped when dislayed to the user.

trans-unit.source: Enter the maximum length for this property. This will only be applicable for specific data types.
trans-unit.target: Enter the maximum length for this property. This will only be applicable for specific data types.

trans-unit.source: Optionally provide a default value for this property.
trans-unit.target: Optionally provide a default value for this property.

trans-unit.source: You can provide a regular expression to validate the data entered for this property.
trans-unit.target: You can provide a regular expression to validate the data entered for this property.

trans-unit.source: Set whether this property is required.
trans-unit.target: Set whether this property is required.

trans-unit.source: Read only profile properties can be edited by the Administrator but are read-only to the user.
trans-unit.target: Read only profile properties can be edited by the Administrator but are read-only to the user.

trans-unit.source: Check this box if this property can be viewed and edited by the user or leave it unchecked if it is visible to Administrators only.
trans-unit.target: Check this box if this property can be viewed and edited by the user or leave it unchecked if it is visible to Administrators only.

trans-unit.source: Enter a number to determine the view order for this property or leave blank to add.
trans-unit.target: Enter a number to determine the view order for this property or leave blank to add.

trans-unit.source: You can set the default visibility of the profile property. This is the initial value of the visibility and applies if the user does not modify it, when editing their profile.
trans-unit.target: You can set the default visibility of the profile property. This is the initial value of the visibility and applies if the user does not modify it, when editing their profile.

trans-unit.source: LOCALIZATION: The next step is to manage the localization of this property. Select the language you want to update, add new text or modify the existing text and then click Update.
trans-unit.target: LOCALIZATION: The next step is to manage the localization of this property. Select the language you want to update, add new text or modify the existing text and then click Update.

trans-unit.source: Enter the Help for this property in the selected language.
trans-unit.target: Enter the Help for this property in the selected language.

trans-unit.source: Enter the text for the property's name in the selected language.
trans-unit.target: Enter the text for the property's name in the selected language.

trans-unit.source: Enter the text for the category's name in the selected language.
trans-unit.target: Enter the text for the category's name in the selected language.

trans-unit.source: Enter the error message to display for this field when the property is Required but not present.
trans-unit.target: Enter the error message to display for this field when the property is Required but not present.

trans-unit.target: Enter the error message to display for this field when the property fails the Regular Expression Validation.

trans-unit.source: You need enter a name for this property.
trans-unit.target: You need enter a name for this property.

trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to delete this profile field?

trans-unit.target: The profile field has been deleted.

trans-unit.target: This property already exists. Property names must be unique. Please select a different name for this property.

trans-unit.source: The required length must be an integer greater than or equal to 0. If you use a TextBox field, the required length must be greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: The required length must be an integer greater than or equal to 0. If you use a TextBox field, the required length must be greater than 0.

trans-unit.source: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are defined as alias, but are not the default alias. Canonical (the alias URL is handled as a Canonical URL), Redirect (redirects to default alias) or None (no additional action is taken).
trans-unit.target: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are defined as alias, but are not the default alias. Canonical (the alias URL is handled as a Canonical URL), Redirect (redirects to default alias) or None (no additional action is taken).

trans-unit.source: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are mapped to the site but are not currently in the list of aliases. This setting is effective in single-site configuration only. Select this option to automatically map new URL.
trans-unit.target: This setting determines how the site responds to URLs which are mapped to the site but are not currently in the list of aliases. This setting is effective in single-site configuration only. Select this option to automatically map new URL.

trans-unit.source: The site alias is invalid. Please choose a different Site Alias.
trans-unit.target: The site alias is invalid. Please choose a different Site Alias.

trans-unit.target: The Site Alias you specified already exists. Please choose a different Site Alias.

trans-unit.target: The site alias has been updated.

trans-unit.source: Enter the maximum word size to be included in the Index.
trans-unit.target: Enter the maximum word size to be included in the Index.

trans-unit.source: Enter the minimum word size to be included in the Index.
trans-unit.target: Enter the minimum word size to be included in the Index.

trans-unit.source: Maximum length of index word is required. Integer must be greater than the minimum length.
trans-unit.target: Maximum length of index word is required. Integer must be greater than the minimum length.

trans-unit.source: Minimum length of index word is required. Integer must be greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: Minimum length of index word is required. Integer must be greater than 0.

trans-unit.source: If this is empty, system will use standard analyzer to index content. if you want to use custom analyzer, please type the full name of analyzer class in this field. Note: If you want existing content to index with the new analyzer, you must visit the Admin > Search Admin page of each site that you want re-index and click the "Re-Index Content" button.
trans-unit.target: If this is empty, system will use standard analyzer to index content. if you want to use custom analyzer, please type the full name of analyzer class in this field. Note: If you want existing content to index with the new analyzer, you must visit the Admin > Search Admin page of each site that you want re-index and click the "Re-Index Content" button.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to return search criteria that occurs within a word rather than only at the beginning of the word. Warning: Enabling wildcard searching may cause performance issues.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to return search criteria that occurs within a word rather than only at the beginning of the word. Warning: Enabling wildcard searching may cause performance issues.

trans-unit.source: Author boost value is associated with the author as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.
trans-unit.target: Author boost value is associated with the author as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

trans-unit.source: Content boost value is associated with the content as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.
trans-unit.target: Content boost value is associated with the content as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

trans-unit.source: Description boost value is associated with the description as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.
trans-unit.target: Description boost value is associated with the description as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

trans-unit.source: Tag boost value is associated with the tag as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.
trans-unit.target: Tag boost value is associated with the tag as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

trans-unit.source: Title boost value is associated with the title as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.
trans-unit.target: Title boost value is associated with the title as it is indexed. The higher the value, the more relevant the field will be for determining the order of the results.

trans-unit.source: Location where Search Index is stored. This location can be manually changed by creating a Host Setting "Search_IndexFolder" in database. It is advised to stop the App Pool prior to making this change. Content from the old folder must be manually copied to new location or a manual re-index must be triggered.
trans-unit.target: Location where Search Index is stored. This location can be manually changed by creating a Host Setting "Search_IndexFolder" in database. It is advised to stop the App Pool prior to making this change. Content from the old folder must be manually copied to new location or a manual re-index must be triggered.

trans-unit.source: Re-Index will cause existing content in the Index Store to be deleted. Re-index is done by search crawler(s) and depends on their scheduling frequency. Are you sure you want to continue?
trans-unit.target: Re-Index will cause existing content in the Index Store to be deleted. Re-index is done by search crawler(s) and depends on their scheduling frequency. Are you sure you want to continue?

trans-unit.target: Compacting Index can be CPU consuming and may require twice the space of the current Index Store for processing. Compacting is done by site search crawler and depends on its scheduling frequency. Are you sure you want to continue?

trans-unit.source: The HTML Editor Manager allows you to easily change your site's HTML editor or configure settings.
trans-unit.target: The HTML Editor Manager allows you to easily change your site's HTML editor or configure settings.

trans-unit.source: The SystemDefault Language is the language that the application uses if no other language is available. It is the ultimate fallback.
trans-unit.target: The SystemDefault Language is the language that the application uses if no other language is available. It is the ultimate fallback.

trans-unit.source: Select the default language for the site here. If the language is not enabled yet, it will be enabled automatically. The default language cannot be changed once Content Localization is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Select the default language for the site here. If the language is not enabled yet, it will be enabled automatically. The default language cannot be changed once Content Localization is enabled.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to enable the Language Parameter in the URL.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to enable the Language Parameter in the URL.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to detect the language selected on the user's browser and switch the site to that language.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to detect the language selected on the user's browser and switch the site to that language.

trans-unit.source: Check this box to allow site users to select a different language for the interface than the one used for content.
trans-unit.target: Check this box to allow site users to select a different language for the interface than the one used for content.

trans-unit.source: Select the fallback language to be used if the selected language is not available.
trans-unit.target: Select the fallback language to be used if the selected language is not available.

trans-unit.source: Re-Index deletes existing content from the Index Store and then re-indexes everything. Re-Indexing is done as part of search crawler(s) scheduled task. To re-index immediately, the Search Crawler should be run manually from the scheduler.
trans-unit.target: Re-Index deletes existing content from the Index Store and then re-indexes everything. Re-Indexing is done as part of search crawler(s) scheduled task. To re-index immediately, the Search Crawler should be run manually from the scheduler.

trans-unit.target: Once localized content is enabled, the default site culture will be permanently set and cannot be changed. Click Cancel now if you want to change the current site default.
